description: [APT29](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0016) has used compromised identities to access networks via SSH,  VPNs, and other remote access tools.(Citation: MSTIC NOBELIUM Mar 2021)(Citation: NCSC APT29 July 2020)(Citation: CrowdStrike StellarParticle January 2022)
